channel.title: NpcDrop problem
channel.description:
I have seemed to fix my npcs, They drop thing's now but the only thing that they drop is charm's now i don't know what up there because i have added all my drops to my Npcdrops.tsm but it just doesn't seem to work ATALL.
If someone could help me, Please post below.
